website_summaries.verdict: The Skechers Citywalk - Malton has been tagged as one of the favorite looks of the Skechers. It exhibits comfortable and stylish Oxford design with lace up front. It carries a smooth leather upper with premium stitching and overlay accents. It provides the finest comfort and support by offering insole with Memory Foam, padded collar and tongue and the soft fabric shoe lining.The shock absorbing low profile and flexible rubber outsole of this shoe provides maximum support while walking with it. However, the outsole of this pair is not grippy enough, especially on wet surfaces.  Reevaluating all the features of the Skechers Citywalk - Malton at the price point that is very affordable, this pair is worth every penny.
pros: Most of the reviewers applauded the comfort the Skechers Citywalk - Malton delivers
A handful of users loved the easy to maintain the exterior of this pair
Many testers revealed that this sneaker gives great arch support
This has great outsole traction, said many users
The Skechers Citywalk - Malton runs true to size
A couple of reviewers expressed their fondness to the large cotton laces
According to them, the laces are easy to tie and do not come undone while walking
Available at a very reasonable price
They would recommend this pair to their peers, said many users
One reviewer liked the color of the sole that blends with the upper
A good shoe for everyday use, said many testers
cons: Some critics complained about the poor ventilation of the Malton from Skechers
A handful criticized about the slippery outsole, especially on wet surfaces
One tester revealed that this shoe doesn’t grip well on the ankle even after adjusting the lace
The plastic-feel when wearing this pair was disapproved by one reviewer
Some experienced squeaky noise when walking in the Citywalk – Malton
One user said this shoe was not made to last

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, fits as expected but quality poor
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, fits as expected but quality poor. Material ripped along stitching on side of shoe after 5-10 wears.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Koval

customer_reviews.title: Slip slidin' away!!
customer_reviews.text: As mentioned in another review, the traction on this shoe is horrible. Even a little wetness on the floor means you have to watch your step and balance. Unfortunately I didn't figure this out until I had worn them a few days, so too late to return. I wear Sketcher's because they can be used in a casual / professional environment where tennis shoes wouldn't be appropriate, but I do not recommend this pair and I will check the tread of any Sketcher's shoes I am thinking of buying in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so it leaves them feeling more like a dress shoes than I prefer to wear
customer_reviews.text: Classic styling but the comfort leaves something to be desired. There is almost no cushion and despite having purchased Skechers with memory foam insoles previously,there's very little memory foam in the foot bed of the shoe,so it leaves them feeling more like a dress shoes than I prefer to wear. I've upgraded them with some aftermarket insoles to help and thrown the stock insoles in the garbage. YMMV,but I like Skechers because they fit my foot shape and were (usually) a very comfortable shoe to wear. These don't feel that comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: L. Kipp

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoe with ZERO PADDING; must buy half-size too big and add insoles
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful shoe that looks super classy, but it has zero padding! It feels too big at first: a little less than a half-size too big, and is quite wide, but once you add in a nice shoe insert/insole, which is a MUST if you want padding, it will make the shoe feel too small, so go a half-size bigger than normal and get some nice insoles, such as these ones:  +4 stars since the shoe looks so great -1 since it has ZERO PADDING. The "memory foam" padding it advertises by the way is absolutely worthless. Just add a nice insole on top and be done!
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel S

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love the support, it's snug, fits great without discomfort and I've used em to run a short distance and they're great (not as a full time running shoe though, just that they hold up for brief, activity). The colors, size, overall fit, quality of material, comfort, and look are fantastic! I’ve gotten compliments on this item and I am completely satisfied and even though I had reservations about the style, I love it and I’d recommend this to anyone. Description, photograph, website presentation, and what arrived are the same-size, shape, and color matched expectations.
customer_reviews.author: 007Top Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: Squeaky Shoes Terrible Customer Service From sketchers.com
customer_reviews.text: Terrible shoes, terrible customer service from Sketchers. These developed a squeaky sound soon after I started wearing them, just dealt with it for a while but it got worse and worse. Contacted Sketchers customer service and a month later and two tickets with no response. I've owned Sketchers for years but this is my last pair unless customer service somehow comes through.
customer_reviews.author: ForwardUntilDawn

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday shoe for wide/flat feet
customer_reviews.text: Great everyday walking shoes. I have wide, flat feet, and usually use an insole, otherwise I can't stay on my feet too long. These shoes have a wide sole, and are roomy. The included (removable) memory foam insole are comfortable enough to not have to swap out for another insole (like superfeet). The leather exterior looks nice enough to wear with business casual outfit (slacks, button-up or polo). Also works with an everyday outfit (jeans, t shirt, etc.)
customer_reviews.author: P. Long

customer_reviews.title: The ad is misleading ..shoe is NOT leather
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these shoes as I had a pair of Skechers urban walkers that were real leather uppers that lasted 12 years. My favorite shoe.but not made anymore. Bought citywalk Marlton as looked the same and add said said 100% leather. They took forever to arrive and they are NOT leather uppers but synthetic leather. I called Sketchers customer service and they confirmed totally synthetic except several decorative strips.. returning shoe immediately and Amazon needs to change the add removing 100% leather.
customer_reviews.author: LJN

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes - LOVE this style!
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing these oxford style sneakers for years and absolutely love this style. It's become increasingly difficult to find them in stores lately, so I was very happy when I saw these very nice looking ones available on Amazon. As most Skechers shoes, they are very comfortable, and they look fantastic! I'm very pleased, and will probably order another pair to put away in case they stop making them completely one day. Highly recommend if you like this kind of shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Quantum Kev

customer_reviews.title: Product has lost it's quality
customer_reviews.text: I have been a long time buyer of Skechers shoes and especially the oxford sneaker. Normally these shoes will last me a year and the only reason why I have to buy a new pair is due to me wearing out the sole and insides. However with my last purchase the sneaker hasn't even lasted 4 months before it started to fall apart. Clearly they have changed the build process and have stared creating poor quality shoes. I will no longer be buying Skechers shoes.
customer_reviews.author: J Lewis

customer_reviews.title: They got their act together
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pair despite a similar pair that I bought last year had fallen apart, ripping at the seems weeks after purchase. I guess they got their act together, because these have been fine so far, knock on wood. One thing to be aware of is that they come untied easily. Every pair of Skechers I've ever bought has the same problem. Not worth docking a star off for, but the buyer should know it ain't all roses.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Just not a good shoe at all
customer_reviews.text: This is a hard, tight sneaker. Man made material that looks like it’s man made material. A great design that’s lost by crappie structure and material. Do not expect any grip from the hard soles. There’s none. I am keeping the shoes. The price was in line with what I got. I live in Florida, so I can ware them around close to home when it rain. And short trips are all I can take from my feet being squeezed so tight.
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay fot
customer_reviews.text: I buy sketchers all the time from the sketchers store and from Kohl’s usually pay about $69 so when I saw these they were a great price. But these were so hard around the outside makes me feel like these were some kind of knock off and not original sketchers also they were supposed to have memory foamInsoles but them two were very hard hard to break in. Point is not sure if their knock off’s for real because the quality was not the same of what I’ve been used to from Skechers
customer_reviews.author: Julio

customer_reviews.title: Husband approved.
customer_reviews.text: My husband buys these shoes once a year. They are his go-to shoes and he is on his feet all day. They wear nicely and don't show their age too much. My husband tends to out a lot of weight on the ball of his foot which makes the shoe wear out faster, but these hold up the best and don't end up with a hole worn out under the ball of his big toe. The fit us exactly as expected. They also have enough room if you wanted to put in gel inserts.
customer_reviews.author: MassResTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Slip sliding away
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look and fit great. Where they go wrong is how slippery they are on wet surfaces. Walking in them on a rainy day is like being on ice skates for the first time, they are especially slippery on steel utility vault covers that are found on sidewalks. If you live where it rains beware these shoes will lead you to only wearing them on sunny days.
customer_reviews.author: Eric1972sea

customer_reviews.title: Upset and wish I could have a refund or replacement
customer_reviews.text: These were my husband’s favorite shoes.. he kept having me get a new pair of these.. but the quality declined a cause one of his shoes’ heel basically collapsed on itself after not even a week of wear!
customer_reviews.author: Honest

customer_reviews.title: Can't recommend these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed in this purchase. I bought sketchers because I have a 13 year old pair that still look and feel like new. These new ones. Fell apart within 2 months of owning them. The lace holes came apart after wearing the shoes 8 times
customer_reviews.author: Nikosdad

customer_reviews.title: Best sneakers ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love these sketchers so much! They fit perfectly. I've been buying this 64455 model for years. I don't know what I'm going to do when they stop making them. I'll have to find a shoe specialist to cast and add new rubber soles to my old pairs. I hate shopping for and trying on new shoes. The continued existence of these sketchers allows me to bypass the disappointments.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine009

customer_reviews.title: Squeaking soles after very little wear
customer_reviews.text: I've barely worn these shoes as they have a narrow sole and I have a bad ankle which causes me to walk on the outside of the sole. I could deal with that, but now they make a squeaking sound with every step. Not as loud on carpet, but you can hear me coming from down the hallway at the office. Very annoying. Too bad cause they are comfortable and look great.
customer_reviews.author: Bearcban

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for myself- I wear an 8.5 in women’s sketchers. I can wear 7 in men’s sizing but they seem a little tight in the width so I always order 7.5 in sketchers brand. I love black pair with faded denim jeans. I ordered the brown, as well. They are really good with dark denim. They seem quality, even though not leather. I recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Sketchers let me down - stitching unravelled after a couple wearings.
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of these shoes - a great compromise for "dressy casual" outfits. The memory foam is a nice touch. However, the pair I received started having the stitching come unravelled around the oustide of the shoe after wearing them just a couple times so that they no longer look nice. I'm hopeful this is just a manufactural defect with my pair and not endemic to this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Reforger

customer_reviews.title: Fits true to size. (Size 14)
customer_reviews.text: My husband will wear sneakers till they die. He doesn't like anything "fancy", but he likes these a lot. He says they fit perfect and very comfortable. He has an average width and medium arch. They seem to fit pretty true to size. He is a 14. So, the majority of his footwear need to be special ordered. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Roco

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than you'd expect.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are similar to a pair I wear a couple days a week but in black so I thought they'd fit the same but boy was I wrong. Not even close. I am very picky about how my shoes fit, but I couldn't even get these on. I'd say they are two sizes smaller than how they are marked.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: an awesome mid grade shoe  and very styling
customer_reviews.text: It lasted about 5 months on the sixth month the inside back of the shoe started wearing holes in my socks. now i have to buy new socks. but superlative quality of the shoe and hasn't lost any structural integrity. only for some reason wearing holes in my socks, at the 5-6 month range, although there doesn't visibly seem to be much wear or tear at all. very baffling
customer_reviews.author: Hans Smith

customer_reviews.title: Already breaking
customer_reviews.text: Fit great but rubber is already coming off in spots. Price was good but thought they would last longer. No cushion in foot so they ache after awhile but alright for price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Soles
customer_reviews.text: I like this style of shoe and have purchased multiple brands over the years. This one looks looks like it will last a long time. The other shoes I’ve purchased have the soles wear out so quickly (I walk a lot!) and these ones have already lasted months with little sign of wear. I’ll probably buy these over and over again!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoes for everyday wear.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of these shoes I've bought my son. He liked them so much last year for school, he wanted them again for this year. He's very hard on shoes, as most teens are, but these hold up wonderfully. I will more than likely be buying these same shoes next year, too. The style and comfort is unbeatable.
customer_reviews.author: Rick A Paddock

customer_reviews.title: These look great, nice styling
customer_reviews.text: These would be Great shoes if they weren't too narrow. I doubt most people over 20 would find these a comfortable enough shoe for daily wear.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Bessee

customer_reviews.title: Not as comfortable as other Skechers I own
customer_reviews.text: I usually love Skechers -- I have owned many pairs -- because their memory foam insoles make them very comfortable to walk in. These feel like I am walking on concrete in my bare feet even though the insole says it is memory foam. I am really disappointed in them and will stick with GoWalk for the future.
customer_reviews.author: RALChicago

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have had some other versions of CityWalk Sketchers and liked them. I tried these and they seem to be a little bit better manufactured than my past ones. They are a little smaller than my older ones and I had to send them back for a half-size bigger. They are nice overall, but could have a little softer of a cushion as I begin to feel them after a long day.
customer_reviews.author: JSKW3

customer_reviews.title: Kind of a dressy shoe but a everyday shoe also!
customer_reviews.text: I Needed a nice looking leather shoe For everyday use that look good and felt good. Other tennis shoes are weak and non supportive. This shoe is very nice well supporting My feet and arch. They absolutely fit perfect. I think a very good value and quality shoe, A+ rating⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
customer_reviews.author: Gerald F.

customer_reviews.title: Squeaky
customer_reviews.text: A couple weeks after wearing these, the left shoe has begun to squeak while walking regardless of the type of surface I'm walking on. Fairly annoying. They would be 4 stars if it weren't for the squeak. My last pair of shoes were of similar style so I got this to stick with what I know and what went with what I wear. They fit well enough, they're comfy enough. Not as comfy as the next style up. Glad we checked Amazon because these were $70+ at Kohl's, definite score getting these for $40.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Metcalfe

customer_reviews.title: Super crappy shoes buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Super crappy quality. My husband has only had these for 1 month and wears them about 3 days a week. We're just slightly out of the return window or we would send them back. The material is peeling on top of the shoe where they crease when you walk. Save your money. You get what you pay for with these
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Molnar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and exactly what i expected!
customer_reviews.text: I have a similar pair and they are great! Fits perfect and love them! Wear them almost everyday since i got them. Update: 10-18-18 Had to drop it to 3 stars. After a couple months these started to squeak and a light pop sound when walking. Never had that issue with any shoes. Both the left and right do it. Other than that they are great. But it is annoying sound especially if you are walking where it is quiet. People can hear you coming and going.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, waterproof shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a winter trip to Norway. They held up to water and snow. We live in the high desert of SoCal - we get freezing snowy winters and 115 degree summers. So far, for the winter, they've held up really well, and I haven't been kind to them. Great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Eric S

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe for business casual environment
customer_reviews.text: I've worn these on and off for a few weeks now and I really like them. Look good with jeans or a pair of khakis and more professional than sneakers. No issue wearing them around the office. Hard to beat for the price. I doubt they will last forever but at this price point I could buy a pair every year and not be mad.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon J Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Skechers Never Disappoint
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are quality made. I was initially a bit disappointed with the fit, feeling as though they were way too stiff. After two weeks of wearing however they fit perfectly and feel as though they conform to my foot. The initial stiffness is gone and they look and feel great. The shoe laces are the perfect length and allow for a double knot.
customer_reviews.author: Hansen Family

customer_reviews.title: All day comfort
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shoe for all day comfort. I’m on my feet walking all day 12+ hours in a warehouse area and these shoes are very comfortable. Good grip on slippery surfaces also. Great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Roger and Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These days so many products are built to die an early death. I don't need to tell you -- shoes are a great example. Poor fit, crummy materials, no workmanship. These are different. I have been wearing sketchers for several years now, and if I can find the style I'm looking for I never hesitate. Somehow, they've cracked the code for what's good for the consumer. I've had this pair over a year now, give them heavy wear, and they are still almost like new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried when I tried them on that they would be too small. But my fears were unfounded. They were just the right amount of snugness without being too loose. I've had a pair of similar sketchers before that I wore until the soles were rubbing off. I am hopeful that this pair will be just as comfortable and just as much to my liking. So I am satisfied with this purchase so far. Time will tell how they hold up to daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Dewitt

customer_reviews.title: Not breathable, only half of insole is memory foam, But appears to be of good quality construction.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes only have memory foam at the back half of the foot, unlike the other sketchers memory foam shoes I have had with the memory foam under the entire foot. the top half of the foot cushion is hard... not even close to even the "Relaxed Fit" insoles. The shoe does not breathe at all, I feel my feet getting very hot and sweating in these shoes, (unlike the previous Sketchers I had (the "relaxed fit" version of this shoe). However, the construction and material of this shoe seems to be of far better quality than my previous pair.
customer_reviews.author: smart shopper

customer_reviews.title: Decent shoes
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my husband to wear to work. He said they fit fine but after 5-6 hours they start hurting his feet on some days where he's walking more. But that could be because the shape of his foot, not because of the shoe itself who knows. He says they're good enough to wear to work every day and that he's happy with them. The complaint that I have is that the insert starting coming out after only 2 months of wearing them. They go right back in, but they come out so easily now.
customer_reviews.author: ReviewMama

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes, comfort-wise it’s closer to a dress shoe
customer_reviews.text: Show is comfortable. It looks something in between a shoe and a sneaker, it feels the same. It doesn’t have as much shock absorbing qualities as a sneaker, but is better than a hard dress shoe. I like the shoes, but can’t walk too much in them. (I have sensitive knees)
customer_reviews.author: Nachal

customer_reviews.title: My Most Comfortable Shoe Yet
customer_reviews.text: First off I love the look of the shoe, they are awesome looking shoes. When I first got them and put them on I was concerned because the comfort level was less then I expected. But they are leather and I decided to wear them and see if it would get better. Well it only took 2 days and they are my go to shoe, plus I will be replacing when I need to with the same shoe. I love them and they are super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: jims

customer_reviews.title: They look great, are well made and I'm sure are true ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a size 14 typically. Sometimes if I cut my toenails and the manufacture is a bit generous with their cut, I can slide into 13s, which is exactly what I'm doing here. They look great, are well made and I'm sure are true to size. So size 14 fellas, if you have prime shipping give it a shot and see if they fit ya. If not, no sweat, just return. I'm keeping mine, but they're not a daily driver for me. Though, I'm sure if I wore them daily, they'd soften up and mold a bit.
customer_reviews.author: heynash

customer_reviews.title: They were "okay"
customer_reviews.text: I liked these shoes as a younger child and expected them to be good work shoes. They were fairly uncomfortable in the heel and had a feeling of "slipping out". The sole of the shoe looks anti-slip, but I would not recommend them as so. If you are looking for comfortable walking shoes, that are also elegant, I would look towards other brands.
customer_reviews.author: MWarciak10

customer_reviews.title: Great looking but rock hard soles
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look great.a casual but yet polished look.great for semi formal events or everyday wear. The inner sole is hard as a rock.seems to have about a 1/8 inch layer of memory foam over a layer of asphalt. Im gonna put in some doctor scholl's inserts to improve the comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Not the shoe in Any picture i was sent..
customer_reviews.text: The shoe I was sent is brown and Grey.... there is Not even a shoe that looks like the one I was sent in the selection. Also not as comfortable as past Sketcher shoes I have owned after only a few seconds. Musd go back.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, nice looking, with good traction.
customer_reviews.text: I really like Skechers, this is my second pair of the same shoe. They are just comfortable, yet they have good traction and look nice. They are a little on the heavy side, but I don’t mind. They sell running shoes if your looking for lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Best Pair of Shoes I've Owned
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the most comfortable shoes.... not they ARE THE most comfortable shoes I've ever owed. I usually have foot problems, so i have arch supports that i wear and I have yet to find a pair of shoes that fits well with those supports.... until now. I love the memory phone and the way these shoes fit.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and nice appearance
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how well this shoe fit and how comfortable it is right out of the box. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: CGIsackson

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Comfortable-for short periods of standing
customer_reviews.text: I use these shoes at work, where our dress code is "business casual". The shoes hold up very well, and are initially very comfortable, but the memory foam insole lacks support for long periods of standing. As a result, my feet feel fatigued at the end of a longer work shift. I will probably purchase some new insoles to add more support.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Quality as expected from Skechers
customer_reviews.text: Been a big fan of Skechers since first pair and their shoes never failed to prove it was worth it. Daily wear for one year with previous pair and it's still on the run! Bought these just in case and definitely love it. I wear size 14, but the model doesn't look like a ski shoe, compact and accurate. Usual assembly quality, all stitches in place, memory foam make it feel like you've been wearing it for months, comfy and and anatomically built. Not a fancy thing of course, working horse through and through - well, that's why I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex A. Shunto

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: First shoe bought without first trying on, and couldn’t be more satisfied. Size 12 is a perfect size 12 and fit better thanks almost any shoe before right out of the box. This shoe has become my go-to daily wearer.
customer_reviews.author: Mike N.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I've only had these shoes for a few days but wear them constantly. I really like the way they fit and look. Others have said that they don't hold up, but I hope they are wrong. I'm already looking at getting a similar pair in brown. Update - after six months or so I am lowering to 3 stars because they have developed a squeak that won't go away. I may have to stop wearing them, which sucks because they are still in great condition and I really like them otherwise. Still very comfortable and have held together great.
customer_reviews.author: R. Ridenour

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable wide fit that looks nice.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look nice and fit like a wide. That works for me and my wide feet but may not work well for others. I actually get compliments on these shoes and I wear them work. I work in a casual environment doing IT work but we still dress nice. I wear a button up shirt and jeans most days. These shoes are very comfortable to me.
customer_reviews.author: James Gross

customer_reviews.title: They Fit
customer_reviews.text: The fit was on the money. I've worn these for three fairly long days in a row and they still feel good. I like the way the shoes look and best of all the flat laces stay tied, unlike round shoe laces.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Texan

customer_reviews.title: Size 15 foot? 14s fit nicely.
customer_reviews.text: I marked these as fitting somewhat large, but that's because I have a size 15 foot and I've found I can comfortably wear Skechers in size 14. Therefore: Skechers is my new favorite brand of shoe. It's pretty rare I run into something that fits and also looks this good. EDIT: I've now owned 4 pairs of these shoes, mainly because the soles wear out fairly quickly. Every single one of them developed a squeak in the heel, and some took on water after some of the treads pushed through the sole. It's hard for me to find nice shoes though in my size, so I keep ordering them.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy with memory foam!
customer_reviews.text: I had always been a fan of Skechers products and this one confirms my fandom. These shoes are just very comfortable shoes. Heck I didn't even know about the memory foam soles so when I put them on they are perfect. No need to break them in; they're good to go right from the start. I highly recommend them
customer_reviews.author: G. Saputra

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME SHOES
customer_reviews.text: This shoes are just AWESOME. They fit as expected, look great, very light and comfy. They have good arch support as well as outdoor grip, but you have to be careful on wet floors. I have not heard them squeak for the duration that I have worn them. They are now my go to work shoes. I were them with brown's as well as blues and have a similar black pair. I would definitely buy them again. I will update my review as I continue to wear the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Leon

customer_reviews.title: Fits well, good colors, lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: These kind of look like baseball shoes from the 1920's. I like the thin shoe sole, lightweight, and colors. The only negative I would give them so far is the upper "leather" is too shiny, which means it is probably bonded leather. Bonded leather usually wears out real fast, but for these shoes, only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, think about half size larger.
customer_reviews.text: They seem to run smallish, maybe a 1/4 size, I ordered 10s and are ok but have to keep my nails trimmed more often. Usually wear a 9.5-10. Next time I order Skechers I will order a half size larger. These are a bit different design than I've had before but they wear well, have worn out 2 pair in the last 5 yesrs, will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Geno

customer_reviews.title: Nike watch-out Sketchers
customer_reviews.text: One of the best shoes new . I broke it in walking to and from a 5 mile walking on a city bike path. An was a beautiful early spring day ! when I was done my feet were not hurting at all. An was supportive, and with the no tie show laces. Great fit, and comfortable! Sketchers is great brand . These are my first pair of this brand wow. Nike watch out !!
customer_reviews.author: Frank Allen

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoes. The insole is glued in. The outsole seems to be non-slip and grips the ground well. The leather upper is very nice quality and warm in the snow. These are also very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, foul smelling
customer_reviews.text: Like the way they look but, sweet baby Jesus, do they make feet smell awful!!!! I don’t know why. My hubby wears other leather shoes to work and they are fine. These make his feet gag-worthy.
customer_reviews.author: J. Herron

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine for about 3 months of 8-hour per day use ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for about 3 months of 8-hour per day use and then developed a popping/snapping sound whenever I would land my left foot while walking. I checked the soles and the liner inside. I can't find anything that would show where the noise is coming from. They still look like new but are so annoying when I walk that I am shopping for other shoes. Not sure if I will get Sketcher's in the future.
customer_reviews.author: G. M.

customer_reviews.title: Fits well, but scratchy interior seams.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit rather nicely size-wise, but the seam where the memory foam insoles meet the shoe is rough, poking and irritating the back of my heel with every step. No sir, I don’t like it.
customer_reviews.author: Carl R

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes but my pair SQUEAKS EVERY STEP
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about these shoes EXCEPT they SQUEAK something terrible when I walk. It's not the insoles either, as if you remove the foam it doesn't make any difference. Hopefully it's idiosyncratic to my pair, but the squeaking sound every step is truly maddening so beware. Seriously though, everything else about this shoe is amazing, worth the squeaky gamble in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I wore out my previous pair of these at work, and was super happy to find the exact same ones here. I'm in an office environment but have numerous meetings throughout the day(plus a .5+ mile walk in from parking lot through office building to my desk). I love the versatility of these shoes, as they are relaxed enough for simply throwing on jeans, or can be worn with most any colored business casual dress pants/slacks.
customer_reviews.author: BeerSultan

customer_reviews.title: size 8.5 US
customer_reviews.text: I wear shoes from skachers size 8.5 US and the size was always the same and felt very comfortable. But this time 8.5 US turned out to be too small and the shoes fit very tightly and the legs get very tired.I was very confident and calm with shoes from skachers, but this time I was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: burji

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: These are a downgrade from the older model which looked the same. The sizing appears to have changed, making them significantly large for the marked size. The comfort has decreased, with a squishier footbed that doesn't provide any arch support whatsoever. The material also has a cheap, synthetic feel to it. I had an old pair just like these that lasted years but when I tried these on, I knew they weren't the same. Back they went. I hope Skechers quality isn't headed downhill in all of their models.
customer_reviews.author: ZenguyTop Contributor: Running

customer_reviews.title: Size 11 wide is a bit smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: It's a great looking shoe and wears well, but I buys size 11 wide in sketcher's all the time and this one feels a little small both in length and is narrower than expected for a 'wide' shoe.
customer_reviews.author: jbearsea

customer_reviews.title: Stitching seems good so far
customer_reviews.text: High quality so far. Leather is stiff (as it should be) when you get them so there is about a week of break-in time for it to conform to your foot. Stitching seems good so far. Tongue doesn't slip out of place. Soles are patterned so that small rocks don't get caught in every groove. Overall I'm satisfied initially. Will have to see if these last over a year.
customer_reviews.author: S. A. Brisendine

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Im happy enough to buy another pair.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for the price. Loosely tied these are my everyday shoes, easy on off. Not a fan of the memory foam insoles but its acceptable. I will be buying another color for sure.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Fashionable but poorly designed.
customer_reviews.text: Quality is OK. The shoes don't breathe well and the rear tab area has issues with the material bunching up. After a couple months I had to throw the shoes out because of the bunching issue. I wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Good show!
customer_reviews.text: The wide are definitely wide enough, even leave a little space. Very comfortable and the quality seems pretty good too! No problems with mine! I bought the all black, but kind of wish I would’ve got a two tone at least.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Great Upgrade From Previous Version
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of sketchers just like this that I bought years ago. They were great but these are much better overall and more comfortable and supportive than the originals. Style wise though... Elvis has probably already left the building.
customer_reviews.author: Itsdonny

customer_reviews.title: A little off on the overall fit
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice shoes. I own seven pair of Skechers and this is the only pair/style that is not as true to fit as the others. Is it due to a mistake or is it simply how they are made? Whichever it may be, the length and width are not the same as the others with this pair. They are such that if I wear a thicker dress/casual sock with them they are too tight and my toes rub in them. Thinner socks make them bearable and not much more. FYI I ordered the size 13W.
customer_reviews.author: E. Dwayne Carter

customer_reviews.title: Not very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Not as comfortable as other Skechers shoes I have bought in the past. The front of the shoe seems to be curved up a bit more then it should be which made it uncomfortable for the first few days of wearing them. I made the mistake of wearing them outside as soon as I received them so I was unable to return them for a refund. The sole does not provide that much support either, at least not for a 6'5" 215 pounds guy. I would not buy these shoes again or recommend them to anyone else. On the other hand they look good.
customer_reviews.author: Bogdan

customer_reviews.title: Not what they used to be
customer_reviews.text: I've had a few pairs of this same model shoe and liked so much I looked for them again when the old ones got worn out. Unfortunately, the quality has tanked. They used to be very soft leather, and fit almost like tennis shoes. The latest pair I ordered felt more like steel toed boots.
customer_reviews.author: lfhsv

customer_reviews.title: Why do all sketchers squeak?
customer_reviews.text: Too slippery on wet surfaces, looks and comfort are ok though. Update: About 2 months in these shoes started to squeak bad, this is the second pair of sketchers this happened with. I'm done with them, quality control is garbage. Three thumbs down
customer_reviews.author: Greg Farz

customer_reviews.title: Love Skechers City walks
customer_reviews.text: I had two pair. The yard work finally got to the five year old pair, so I had to buy a third pair. My three year old pair are now my for yard work and these shiny new shoes are for casual dress about town.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a comfortable shoe that I can use to exercise or walk distance in. I was also looking for something that could accommodate my flat feet (need something wide). This shoe fits the bill. It's very comfortable and good for walking. It looks decent also, which is important to me as I was looking for something I can wear with my casual clothes for a social outing. To give a 5-star, a product really has to exceed my expectations, so I don't hand those out too often.
customer_reviews.author: Alper Basoglu

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME ALL THE WAY AROUND
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes. I bought these strongly based on A. Their looks and B. The fact that one reviewer stated that it really helped him with his torn meniscus. I, too, suffer from that along with pretty bad osteoarthritis, and I really look forward to wearing these shoes and having less discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Mino

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoe but.
customer_reviews.text: Could have a little more cushion and the way I walk the heal wears off fast on one side. Also the small nobs on the bottom wear off fast . To bad because they are a good looking shoe.
customer_reviews.author: jl

customer_reviews.title: Very Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: I like how there was room in the shoe and that the bottom provided support for my feet. As a teacher I am constantly on my feet and I feel the impact of that and constantly walking up and down the stairs on a consistent basis these shoes have made a huge difference in terms of comfort
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Nice casual shoes when tennis shoes aren’t appropriate
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look and feel of these shoes for casual wear when tennis shoes aren’t appropriate. This is my second pair after owning an older pair of these shoes. Sketchers seem to run larger, I wear 9 in every other shoe brand but sketchers. I went with the 8.5 because my old pair was an 8. Glad it did because the 8.5 is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Surprised he loved them so much.
customer_reviews.text: My husband is picky. After looking for shoes that resembled the old Diesel brand shoes, he finally found these. He loved them so much he ended up getting the brown ones too.
customer_reviews.author: Jetmom23

customer_reviews.title: not suitable for every day use
customer_reviews.text: purchased as a replacement pair is shoes. rather unhappy with this shoe. I will not use it as an every day wearable. the fit is OK, but. comfort is fair to low. this is NOT 100 % leather upper as the ad describes. upper is mostly man made. the man made upper makes the shoe heavier, less breathable, rather stiff, and not suited for daily use. will use them for yard work or rainy days. would not recommend the,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super Shoe
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is a gift but it is lovely and based on previous purchases from this brand I know they will fit perfectly and be very well received when it is opened.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal D. Lahey

customer_reviews.title: Really great, looks good feels better.
customer_reviews.text: These fit great and are comfortable right from the start. The black has brown stitching that I thought I wouldn't like, but it actually works well. No complaints at all after a couple weeks of wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: MKPJKP

customer_reviews.title: These are great. Really comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Really comfortable, and fit to size. I expected them to be narrow and they are actually a lot wider than I expected even in the standard width. They work, but they were even a bit wide for my liking as far as looks/bulk in a standard width. Can't complain though as they are great work shoes and are comfortable enough to walk around in all day.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Lehne

customer_reviews.title: Four thumbs up!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband to wear to work. He is a doctor and on his feet all day. He also has relatively wide but tiny feet. He wears a 6.5 which is very difficult to find in stores. This shoes exceeded our expectations. They are well made, affordable, comfortable, and good looking shoes. We will defiantly be buying another pair. Not to add we received they extremely quick!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan F.

customer_reviews.title: Size matters
customer_reviews.text: These were for my husband and they were tight, hes still trying to break them in. I would suggest to order a size larger than normal because he has to wear super thin socks and they are still too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: Attractive design, good price. Fits ok (8 1/2 E) but a slight bit on the small side for an 8 1/2. Would order a nine had I not worn them too much to return.
customer_reviews.author: buyer1

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is a strong and sturdy shoe, It looks great and my feet and fits perfectly, I also received a lot of compliments on it. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Willy

customer_reviews.title: Good Style, Wide, But No Cushion
customer_reviews.text: If you need a very wide shoe, these are your shoes! Gave them 4 stars bc there is not very much cushion in the bottom of footbed and no arch support. Good coach’s shoes (my primary use for them) but not ones I would want to wear all day.
customer_reviews.author: Joel B.

customer_reviews.title: Like them a lot
customer_reviews.text: Well made as usual by Sketchers. A little tight for the first few wearings, but they broke in nicely. Probably my 12th pair of Sketchers over the years.
customer_reviews.author: Fatman

customer_reviews.title: Good overall looks
customer_reviews.text: Styling Looks great, I purchase to replace my 8 year old Skechers, but these were on the tight side and the quality don't feel as good as my older ones.
customer_reviews.author: nimrod666

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Like these shoes and sketchers shoes. Been more than happy with the shoes I've purchased from the sketchers brand. I do with they were consistent with the shoe sizes though. I've purchased some works shoes that size was slightly different.
customer_reviews.author: tom

product_meta.title: Skechers USA Citywalk Malton Oxford Sneaker
feature_bullets: Stylish lace-up sneaker featuring logo patch at tongue and durable-rubber outsole
